name: criminally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to committing or punishing crimes: We allege that his behaviour was criminally negligent. He is too young to be held criminally responsible.
in a way that is very bad or morally wrong: Car parking at an airport is criminally expensive.humorous They have a really good chicken dish with a sauce that is criminally delicious. See
criminal
More examplesFewer examplesAs a general rule, the offender is criminally liable for all the consequences of his felonious act.She escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.They realize that much of the world thinks they are criminally lucky.
